text: Yes, aelf blockchain runs different types of nodes to support its network. Below are two primary types of nodes:Block Producer (BP): Participates in the consensus mechanism and produces blocks. Currently, there are 21 BPs and 4 candidate nodes.Candidate Node (CN): Maintains a complete copy of the aelf blockchain and facilitates network communication and data propagation.For the most current number of nodes and their specific details, you can check the Network DAO.
title: Does aelf run any nodes? How many are there currently?
